item.title: Ardei umpluti with meat
item.description: Farcies tomates with rice. ‚è≤Ô∏è Prep time: 10 min üç≥ Cook time: 40 min üçΩÔ∏è Servings: 4 Ingredients 2 yellow peppers per person Around 120g of ground beef meat per person. 1 or 2 onions. Condiments of your choice: Parsley, origan or cumin. Olive oil Salt and pepper. Optional: Bechamel. Directions Heat the oven to 200C. Empty the peppers and remove the seeds. Slice the top to the peppers and place them in the oven tray, you may need to slice the bottom a litte bit to make them stand together.
